scripts.build:ipfs:rinkeby: yarn && yarn prep:ipfs && yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph build --ipfs https://ipfs.network.thegraph.com/
scripts.build:ipfs:mainnet: yarn && yarn prep:ipfs && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph build --ipfs https://ipfs.network.thegraph.com
scripts.build:ipfs:rinkeby-no-ipfs: yarn && yarn prep:no-ipfs && yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph build --ipfs https://ipfs.network.thegraph.com/
scripts.build:ipfs:mainnet-no-ipfs: yarn && yarn prep:no-ipfs && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph build --ipfs https://ipfs.network.thegraph.com
scripts.deploy-mainnet-staging: yarn && yarn prep:ipfs && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-mainnet-staging --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-mainnet-staging-no-ipfs: yarn && yarn prep:no-ipfs && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-mainnet-staging --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-mainnet: yarn && yarn prep:ipfs && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-mainnet --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-mainnet-no-ipfs: yarn && yarn prep:no-ipfs && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-mainnet --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-testnet: yarn && yarn prep:ipfs && yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-testnet --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-testnet-no-ipfs: yarn && yarn prep:no-ipfs && yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-testnet --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-testing: yarn && yarn prep:<IPFS_OR_NO-IPFS> && yarn <INSERT_MAINNET_OR_RINKEBY> && graph deploy <INSERT_SUBGRAPH_NAME> --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: yarn prep:addresses:rinkeby && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:mainnet: yarn prep:addresses:mainnet && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
